content.content: Creating a place for delegates and gov participants to provide constructive feedback on Season 3. Please leave constructive feedback so we keep the signal to noise ratio high in here! All forum engagement is subject to the Forum Rules of Engagement
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is asking for feedback on Season 3 and is specifically requesting constructive feedback from delegates and government participants. The post is not explaining the proposal itself, but rather asking for feedback on it.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
